attributes.action: That HM government should call an end to the war on Afghanistan by initiating an immediate ceasefire and all party peace talks as in Northern Ireland
attributes.additional_details:
Operation Enduring Freedom has lasted for ten years, longer than World Wars l & ll together and brought no freedom for anyone.
It has been agreed that there is no military solution and the majority of people in this country are against it and want the troops home. Many never wanted it in the first place. Hundreds of British soldiers have died in vain and thousands of Afghan civilians
The only solution is to stop the fighting immediately and sit down to talk peace so that Afghans can take control of their own country again
